title: Morning Joe 5/4/22
description: Republican lawmakers are demanding a federal investigation into who leaked the Supreme Court draft opinion, and the Morning Joe panel discusses who may be behind the leak and why.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
